content.raw: Hi Vinny, as a start, I’d suggest you reading [#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/CONTRIBUTING.md#markdown-header-contributing-code](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/CONTRIBUTING.md#markdown-header-contributing-code) and deciding to which ign-math version you want to send the merge request. I assume you’d prefer to have the changes merged to the version you are using. These should not break API/ABI, so the maintainers would probably be open to merging the changes to any supported version. But to be on the safe side, you could also start adding the change to the default branch and then asking for backporting the changes.
content.html: Hi Vinny, as a start, I’d suggest you reading #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/CONTRIBUTING.md#markdown-header-contributing-code and deciding to which ign-math version you want to send the merge request. I assume you’d prefer to have the changes merged to the version you are using. These should not break API/ABI, so the maintainers would probably be open to merging the changes to any supported version. But to be on the safe side, you could also start adding the change to the default branch and then asking for backporting the changes.
